title: TwistedFate W bug.

embed.description: As far as i know only problem with this skin. I honestly couldn't see what card i was picking while looking at the champion model almost at all. Had to try to look at the w ability witch limited the gameplay a lot.

body: All cards are showing when pressing w. Makes it impossible to choose the right card when watching the model. Maybe this bug is only on this skin? Personally tested Classic - Horrowing skin and this. Unluckily Cutpurse was the only one i had to play a ranked with. Hope this gets fixed, or at least people get to know about it

replies.body:
Hey Isgris -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. In the meantime, the skin is going to be disabled.
